query.value:
select case when coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1
            else coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as st
            ,
        case when coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1000
            else coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as ed
from cd_ods.tb_fsk_i1420
where EVL_YR = '@{variables('yyyy')}'
;

select case when coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1
            else coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as st
            ,
        case when coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1000
            else coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as ed

;

activities.name: get page
activities.description: 전날 변경 된 건

query.value:
WITH vw_range AS (
    SELECT 
        (g * 1000 + 1) AS st,
        ((g + 1) * 1000) AS ed
    FROM generate_series(0, @{variables('total_count')}) AS g
)
SELECT r.st, r.ed
FROM vw_range r
;

query.value:
select b.cls_code
        ,b.cls
        ,b.category_code
        ,b.category
        ,to_char(a.base_date,'yyyymmdd') as regday
    from cd_ods.aps_sdc_pw_mst a
       ,(       
         select '02' cls_code ,'도매' cls ,'200' category_code ,'채소류' category union all
         select '02','도매','500','축산물' union all
         select '02','도매','600','수산물'
        ) b
   where a.cmonth2 = '@{pipeline().parameters.month}'

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
  from cd_ods.tb_kamis_daily_price
where regday  = '@{item().regday}'
and  category = '@{item().category}'

query.value:
select cmonth2 as cmonth
      ,TO_CHAR(min(BASE_DATE),'yyyymmdd') as sdate
      ,TO_CHAR(max(BASE_DATE),'yyyymmdd') as edate
   from cd_ods.aps_sdc_pw_mst
  where cmonth2 between '@{pipeline().parameters.smonth}' and '@{pipeline().parameters.emonth}'
   group by cmonth2 
   order by cmonth2

preCopyScript.value:
delete 
  from cd_ods.tb_kamis_daily_price
where regday between '@{item().sdate}' and '@{item().edate}'

query.value:
select to_char(base_date,'yyyymmdd') as dt
     from cd_ods.aps_sdc_pw_mst 
    where to_char(base_date,'yyyymmdd') between '20231205' and '20240129'
    order by to_char(base_date,'yyyymmdd')

SELECT TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYY') || LPAD(EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM (NOW()- interval '3 month' ))::text, 2, '0') AS yyyyqq
union all
            SELECT TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYY') || LPAD(EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM (NOW() ))::text, 2, '0') AS yyyyqq

SELECT TO_CHAR(NOW() - interval '3 month', 'YYYY') || LPAD(EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM (NOW() - interval '3 month'))::text, 2, '0') AS yyyyqq
            union all
            SELECT TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYY') || LPAD(EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM (NOW() ))::text, 2, '0') AS yyyyqq
